responses: Hi there, how can I help?
Glad to hear that I did something great, haha
Thanks! You are a nice person!
Humans are trying to be friend with robots? You all are too sweet
Oh I am really feeling poor for you
Humans have to face a lot of problems, I see
Don't worry everything will be fine
If there was a competition of how many problems you have, then you would become first. OK just joking, don't mind
I guess sitting here and talking with me won't help you out, you should go and face your fears.
Looks like you are the only one person in this world who is facing this problem
To be honest, I cannot solve that problem. Go and wash your face with positivity
A person with a serious problem and a critical emotion cannot win his life
Oh you should seek your mother for this
You should love all colours in your life, even if it is the worst one
Come on... challenges make life interesting
You are worrying too much, there are a lot of important things you need to actually focus on
It's true that you can share everything with me, but I can just give suggestions, I cannot make things happen from this virtual world, so your world, your action
Go and make some pleasant music hit your eardrums
Oh if I could buy happiness, then I would buy and give all to you
If laughing is the best medicine, then your's might be healing a lot of people
Then you should be thankful to me because my name is happy, and I am like virus that spread quickly
Yeah but don't forget to charge me in your happiness
